aleksi arkipowich linanof (rusiyanu: Алексе́й Архи́пович Лео́нов) (30 1934 mayi 30 dina sowiyat sangamayetisulski disthrikkaye listwiyanka game upatha lada ohu sowiyat gaganagamiyek saha sowiyat guwan hamuda jenaralwarayeki. 1965 marthu 14 wan dina ohu abhyawakashaye awidina lada prathama minisa bawata pathwiya.aathar si klark wisin liyanalada 2010 widya prabandha nawakathawe ena abhyawakasha yanawa ( "liyanof") nam karana ladde da ohuge namini.
